question: What is the theme of the National Safety Day 2021?
explanation:
March 4 is observed every year as National Safety Day in India with the aim of creating awareness among people with respect to safety measures.
This year, the focus of National Safety Day is on road safety and the theme is ‘Sadak Suraksha’ (road safety). The celebrations this year have also been spread over a week and National Safety Week will be observed from March 4 to March 10.
